comment: He's a really really nice guy, but overall I wouldn't take his class again because he's really confusing and not very clear in his lectures and instructions. He obviously knows the subject though, and he's very smart, but I don't think teaching is his strength. I really struggled to get an A in this class, one of the hardest things I've ever done.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Tests are tough--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This class was an easy A for me. His quizzes were straight forward and the answers were easily accessible. I would take him again. You just need to pay attention to when he opens and closes quizzes. The times can be funky.
WORST CLASS EVER! Statistics is already hard, but he makes it even more difficult. He's a nice guy, and thinks he is helpful, but it is like talking to a wall because he doesn't know how to teach.
